organisation_name: Guild of European Business Travel Association (GEBTA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: GEBTA, the Guild of European Business Travel Agents, represents the travel management industry with some 300 major travel management companies generating a significant part of the business travel sales in Europe.
